org.apache.hadoop.fs

Class FileContextCreateMkdirBaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileContextCreateMkdirBaseTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestFcCreateMkdirLocalFs, TestLocalFSFileContextCreateMkdir

    public abstract class FileContextCreateMkdirBaseTest
extends Object

    A collection of tests for the FileContext, create method This test should be used for testing an instance of FileContext that has been initialized to a specific default FileSystem such a LocalFileSystem, HDFS,S3, etc.

    To test a given FileSystem implementation create a subclass of this test and override setUp() to initialize the fc FileContext instance variable. Since this a junit 4 you can also do a single setup before the start of any tests. E.g.
